Title: Hush
Writer: Jonathan Darby (story), Jonathan Darby (screenplay), Jane Rusconi (screenplay)
Actors: Jessica Lange, Gwyneth Paltrow, Johnathon Schaech, Nina Foch
Plot: Helen is the young girlfriend of good-looking Jackson Baring. When Helen gets pregnant and marries Jackson, they decide to move to his family farm, Kilronan, and have a baby there. But his mother Martha, who lives there, starts to do weird things, and obviously she's not too friendly to Helen.
